this_title: Cuộc Nổi Loạn Của Tâm Hồn
introduction: The drama explores themes of self-reflection and the internal crises faced by individuals affected by immunodeficiency (HIV/AIDS). It symbolizes the battle within the soul, personified through emotional spirits, depicting a journey from self-doubt and fear to overcoming physical and psychological challenges, reclaiming hope, and rediscovering love and control over one’s life.
chinese_title: Cuộc Nổi Loạn Của Tâm Hồn
